desc: You create an acidic bubble at a point within range, where it explodes in a 5-foot-radius Sphere. Each creature in that Sphere must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take ld6 Acid damage.
higher_level: The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach levels 5 (2d6), 11 (3d6), 17 (4d6).
name: Acid Splash

desc: Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration.
higher_level: Each target's Hit Points increase by 5 for each spell slot level above 2.
name: Aid
